docs.snippet: Harvey admitted he had been “stubborn” for pushing the front office to allow him to return by the end of last season, and seemed receptive to the idea of an innings limit in 2015....

docs.abstract: Baseball Roundup; New York Mets pitcher Matt Harvey updates reporters on his recovery after Tommy John surgery and says he expects to resume throwing off a mound by mid-December 2014; other MLB news noted.

headline.main: After a Season of Pushing to Return, Mets’ Matt Harvey Details a Patient Plan for 2015
